State it as a theorem named Shakarchi_exercise_1_19c taking (z : ℂ) (hz : Complex.abs z = 1) (hne : z ≠ 1) and concluding Summable (fun n : ℕ => z^(n+1)/(n+1)). /-- This function should generate the steps to prove the statement "all even numbers are divisible by two".
It should start with "intros, cases, simp".

The output should be in the format generated by the "intros, cases, simp" tactic. -/

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Complex

theorem Shakarchi_exercise_1_19c (z : ℂ) (hz : Complex.abs z = 1) (hne : z ≠ 1) :
  Summable (fun n : ℕ => z ^ (n + 1) / (n + 1 : ℂ)) := by sorry
